|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [reportProgress](./puppeteer.protocol.heapprofiler.takeheapsnapshotrequest.reportprogress.md) | boolean | If true 'reportHeapSnapshotProgress' events will be generated while snapshot is being taken. |
